mapper.select: SELECT log_id, FN_COM_CODE_CONVERT_NAME('COM001', log_gb) AS log_gb, report_no, business_nm, user_id, user_nm, dispose_tm, report_upload_tm, report_status, network_path, access_loctn, dispose_user_nm, dispose_user_id FROM bd_log_info ORDER BY log_id DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bd_log_info( log_id, log_gb, report_no, business_nm, user_id, user_nm, dispose_tm, report_upload_tm, report_status, network_path, access_loctn, dispose_user_nm, dispose_user_id) VALUES( #{log_id}, #{log_gb}, #{report_no}, #{business_nm}, #{user_id}, #{user_nm}, NOW(), #{report_upload_tm}, #{report_status}, #{network_path}, #{access_loctn}, #{dispose_user_nm}, #{dispose_user_id})
